summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: LoginPage now performs Internet Identity login then checks admin status and routes to /admin or /dashboard with error handling; Footer social links now point to the specified Agrigence URLs and open safely in new tabs.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a "Terms and Conditions" link in the footer (route "/terms-and-conditions"), which was not requested as part of REQ-1 or REQ-2.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to fix admin login redirect behavior and replace placeholder social media links; it did not request adding new footer navigation items.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions new Terms and Conditions route in App.tsx)
